thread.title: USA TODAY investigations editor Hillkirk to leave after 33-year tenure
thread.title_full: USA TODAY investigations editor Hillkirk to leave after 33-year tenure

title: USA TODAY investigations editor Hillkirk to leave after 33-year tenure
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: Money - Today 
Investigative team editor and former editor in chief John Hillkirk will leave USA TODAY at the end November, concluding a 33-year tenure...
